verses.verse: For <WG1063> the <WG3588> kingdom <WG932> of heaven <WG3772> is <WG2076> like unto <WG3664> a man <WG444> that is a householder, <WG3617> which <WG3748> went out <WG1831> early in the morning <WG260> <WG4404> to hire <WG3409> laborers <WG2040> into <WG1519> his <WG848> vineyard. <WG290>

And <WG1161> when he had agreed <WG4856> with <WG3326> the <WG3588> laborers <WG2040> for <WG1537> a penny <WG1220> a day, <WG2250> he sent <WG649> them <WG846> into <WG1519> his <WG848> vineyard. <WG290>
And <WG2532> he went out <WG1831> about <WG4012> the <WG3588> third <WG5154> hour, <WG5610> and saw <WG1492> others <WG243> standing <WG2476> idle <WG692> in <WG1722> the <WG3588> marketplace, <WG58>

And said unto them; <WG2548> <WG2036> Go <WG5217> ye <WG5210> also <WG2532> into <WG1519> the <WG3588> vineyard, <WG290> and <WG2532> whatsoever <WG3739> <WG1437> is <WG5600> right <WG1342> I will give <WG1325> you. <WG5213> And <WG1161> they <WG3588> went their way. <WG565>
Again <WG3825> he went out <WG1831> about <WG4012> the sixth <WG1623> and <WG2532> ninth <WG1766> hour, <WG5610> and did <WG4160> likewise. <WG5615>

And <WG1161> about <WG4012> the <WG3588> eleventh <WG1734> hour <WG5610> he went out, <WG1831> and found <WG2147> others <WG243> standing <WG2476> idle, <WG692> and <WG2532> saith <WG3004> unto them, <WG846> Why <WG5101> stand <WG2476> ye here <WG5602> all <WG3650> the <WG3588> day <WG2250> idle? <WG692>

They say <WG3004> unto him, <WG846> Because <WG3754> no man <WG3762> hath hired <WG3409> us. <WG2248> He saith <WG3004> unto them, <WG846> Go <WG5217> ye <WG5210> also <WG2532> into <WG1519> the <WG3588> vineyard; <WG290> and <WG2532> whatsoever <WG3739> <WG1437> is <WG5600> right, <WG1342> that shall ye receive. <WG2983>

So <WG1161> when even <WG3798> was come, <WG1096> the <WG3588> lord <WG2962> of the <WG3588> vineyard <WG290> saith unto his <WG848> steward, <WG2012> Call <WG2564> the <WG3588> laborers, <WG2040> and <WG2532> give <WG591> them <WG846> their hire, <WG3408> beginning <WG756> from <WG575> the <WG3588> last <WG2078> unto <WG2193> the <WG3588> first. <WG4413>
And <WG2532> when they came <WG2064> that <WG3588> were hired about <WG4012> the <WG3588> eleventh <WG1734> hour, <WG5610> they received <WG2983> every man <WG303> a penny. <WG1220>

But <WG1161> when the <WG3588> first <WG4413> came, <WG2064> they supposed <WG3543> that <WG3754> they should have received <WG2983> more; <WG4119> and <WG2532> they <WG846> likewise <WG2532> received <WG2983> every man <WG303> a penny. <WG1220>
And <WG1161> when they had received <WG2983> it, they murmured <WG1111> against <WG2596> the <WG3588> goodman of the house, <WG3617>

Saying, <WG3004> These <WG3778> last <WG2078> have wrought <WG4160> but one <WG3391> hour, <WG5610> and <WG2532> thou hast made <WG4160> them <WG846> equal <WG2470> unto us, <WG2254> which have borne <WG941> the <WG3588> burden <WG922> and <WG2532> heat <WG2742> of the <WG3588> day. <WG2250>

But <WG1161> he <WG3588> answered <WG611> one <WG1520> of them, <WG846> and said, <WG2036> Friend, <WG2083> I do thee no wrong: <WG91> <WG4571> <WG3756> didst not <WG3780> thou agree <WG4856> with me <WG3427> for a penny? <WG1220>
Take <WG142> that thine <WG4674> is, and <WG2532> go thy way: <WG5217> I <WG1161> will <WG2309> give <WG1325> unto this <WG5129> last, <WG2078> even <WG2532> as <WG5613> unto thee. <WG4671>

Is it not lawful <WG1832> <WG3756> for me <WG3427> to do <WG4160> what <WG3739> I will <WG2309> with <WG1722> mine own? <WG1699> <WG1487> Is <WG2076> thine <WG4675> eye <WG3788> evil, <WG4190> because <WG3754> I <WG1473> am <WG1510> good? <WG18>

So <WG3779> the <WG3588> last <WG2078> shall be <WG2071> first, <WG4413> and <WG2532> the <WG3588> first <WG4413> last: <WG2078> for <WG1063> many <WG4183> be <WG1526> called, <WG2822> but <WG1161> few <WG3641> chosen. <WG1588>

And <WG2532> Jesus <WG2424> going up <WG305> to <WG1519> Jerusalem <WG2414> took <WG3880> the <WG3588> twelve <WG1427> disciples <WG3101> apart <WG2596> <WG2398> in <WG1722> the <WG3588> way, <WG3598> and <WG2532> said <WG2036> unto them, <WG846>

Behold, <WG2400> we go up <WG305> to <WG1519> Jerusalem: <WG2414> and <WG2532> the <WG3588> Son <WG5207> of man <WG444> shall be betrayed <WG3860> unto the <WG3588> chief priests <WG749> and <WG2532> unto the scribes, <WG1122> and <WG2532> they shall condemn <WG2632> him <WG846> to death, <WG2288>

And <WG2532> shall deliver <WG3860> him <WG846> to the <WG3588> Gentiles <WG1484> to mock, <WG1702> and <WG2532> to scourge, <WG3146> and <WG2532> to crucify <WG4717> him: and <WG2532> the <WG3588> third <WG5154> day <WG2250> he shall rise again. <WG450>

Then <WG5119> came <WG4334> to him <WG846> the <WG3588> mother <WG3384> of Zebedee's <WG2199> children <WG5207> with <WG3326> her <WG848> sons, <WG5207> worshiping <WG4352> him, and <WG2532> desiring <WG154> a certain thing <WG5100> of <WG3844> him. <WG846>

And <WG1161> he <WG3588> said <WG2036> unto her, <WG846> What <WG5101> wilt <WG2309> thou? She saith <WG3004> unto him, <WG846> Grant <WG2036> that <WG2443> these <WG3778> my <WG3450> two <WG1417> sons <WG5207> may sit, <WG2523> the one <WG1520> on <WG1537> thy <WG4675> right hand, <WG1188> and <WG2532> the other <WG1520> on <WG1537> the left, <WG2176> in <WG1722> thy <WG4675> kingdom. <WG932>

But <WG1161> Jesus <WG2424> answered <WG611> and said, <WG2036> Ye know <WG1492> not <WG3756> what <WG5101> ye ask. <WG154> Are ye able <WG1410> to drink <WG4095> of the <WG3588> cup <WG4221> that <WG3739> I <WG1473> shall <WG3195> drink <WG4095> of, and <WG2532> to be baptized <WG907> with the <WG3588> baptism <WG908> that <WG3739> I <WG1473> am baptized <WG907> with? They say <WG3004> unto him, <WG846> We are able. <WG1410>

And <WG2532> he saith <WG3004> unto them, <WG846> Ye shall drink <WG4095> indeed <WG3303> of my <WG3450> cup, <WG4221> and <WG2532> be baptized <WG907> with the <WG3588> baptism <WG908> that <WG3739> I <WG1473> am baptized <WG907> with: but <WG1161> to sit <WG2523> on <WG1537> my <WG3450> right hand, <WG1188> and <WG2532> on <WG1537> my <WG3450> left, <WG2176> is <WG2076> not <WG3756> mine <WG1699> to give, <WG1325> but <WG235> it shall be given to them for whom <WG3739> it is prepared <WG2090> of <WG5259> my <WG3450> Father. <WG3962>
And <WG2532> when the <WG3588> ten <WG1176> heard <WG191> it, they were moved with indignation <WG23> against <WG4012> the <WG3588> two <WG1417> brethren. <WG80>

But <WG1161> Jesus <WG2424> called <WG4341> them <WG846> unto him, and said, <WG2036> Ye know <WG1492> that <WG3754> the <WG3588> princes <WG758> of the <WG3588> Gentiles <WG1484> exercise dominion <WG2634> over them, <WG846> and <WG2532> they that are great <WG3173> exercise authority <WG2715> upon them. <WG846>

But <WG1161> it shall not <WG3756> be <WG2071> so <WG3779> among <WG1722> you: <WG5213> but <WG235> whosoever <WG3739> <WG1437> will <WG2309> be <WG1096> great <WG3173> among <WG1722> you, <WG5213> let him be <WG2077> your <WG5216> minister; <WG1249>
And <WG2532> whosoever <WG3739> <WG1437> will <WG2309> be <WG1511> chief <WG4413> among <WG1722> you, <WG5213> let him be <WG2077> your <WG5216> servant: <WG1401>

Even as <WG5618> the <WG3588> Son <WG5207> of man <WG444> came <WG2064> not <WG3756> to be ministered unto, <WG1247> but <WG235> to minister, <WG1247> and <WG2532> to give <WG1325> his <WG848> life <WG5590> a ransom <WG3083> for <WG473> many. <WG4183>
And <WG2532> as they <WG846> departed <WG1607> from <WG575> Jericho, <WG2410> a great <WG4183> multitude <WG3793> followed <WG190> him. <WG846>

And, <WG2532> behold, <WG2400> two <WG1417> blind men <WG5185> sitting <WG2521> by <WG3844> the <WG3588> way side, <WG3598> when they heard <WG191> that <WG3754> Jesus <WG2424> passed by, <WG3855> cried out, <WG2896> saying, <WG3004> Have mercy <WG1653> on us, <WG2248> O Lord, <WG2962> thou son <WG5207> of David. <WG1138>

And <WG1161> the <WG3588> multitude <WG3793> rebuked <WG2008> them, <WG846> because <WG2443> they should hold their peace: <WG4623> but <WG1161> they <WG3588> cried <WG2896> the more, <WG3185> saying, <WG3004> Have mercy <WG1653> on us, <WG2248> O Lord, <WG2962> thou son <WG5207> of David. <WG1138>
And <WG2532> Jesus <WG2424> stood still, <WG2476> and called <WG5455> them, <WG846> and <WG2532> said, <WG2036> What <WG5101> will <WG2309> ye that I shall do <WG4160> unto you? <WG5213>
They say <WG3004> unto him, <WG846> Lord, <WG2962> that <WG2443> our <WG2257> eyes <WG3788> may be opened. <WG455>

So <WG1161> Jesus <WG2424> had compassion <WG4697> on them, and touched <WG680> their <WG846> eyes: <WG3788> and <WG2532> immediately <WG2112> their <WG846> eyes <WG3788> received sight, <WG308> and <WG2532> they followed <WG190> him. <WG846>
